name: brainsait-healthcare-mcp
description: HIPAA/NPHIES compliant healthcare MCP extension with FHIR R4 support, clinical decision support, and bilingual Arabic/English capabilities
long_description: Comprehensive healthcare MCP extension for BrainSAIT platform providing FHIR R4 resource management, clinical terminology validation (ICD-10, CPT, LOINC), audit logging, and bilingual Arabic/English support. Designed for Saudi healthcare interoperability with NPHIES compliance.

tools.name: validate_fhir_resource
tools.description: Validate FHIR R4 resources for compliance and clinical accuracy

tools.name: clinical_terminology_lookup
tools.description: Look up ICD-10, CPT, LOINC codes with Arabic/English translations

tools.name: audit_log_query
tools.description: Query audit logs for compliance reporting and security monitoring

tools.name: nphies_interoperability_check
tools.description: Validate resources for NPHIES Saudi interoperability standards

tools.name: clinical_decision_support
tools.description: Provide clinical decision support based on patient data and guidelines

tools.name: bilingual_content_translate
tools.description: Translate medical content between Arabic and English with clinical accuracy

tools.name: phi_encryption_handler
tools.description: Encrypt/decrypt PHI data with HIPAA-compliant methods

tools.name: role_based_access_control
tools.description: Validate user permissions and roles for healthcare data access

prompts.name: clinical_assessment
prompts.description: Generate clinical assessments based on patient data
prompts.text: Based on the following patient data: ${arguments.patient_data}, generate a ${arguments.assessment_type} clinical assessment in ${arguments.language} language. Ensure FHIR R4 compliance and include relevant ICD-10/CPT codes.

prompts.name: fhir_resource_generator
prompts.description: Generate FHIR R4 resources from clinical data
prompts.text: Generate a FHIR R4 ${arguments.resource_type} resource from the following clinical data: ${arguments.clinical_data}. Ensure ${arguments.compliance_level} compliance level with proper validation and audit trail.

prompts.name: compliance_report
prompts.description: Generate compliance reports for audit purposes
prompts.text: Generate a comprehensive compliance report for ${arguments.audit_period} following ${arguments.compliance_framework} standards in ${arguments.language}. Include audit trails, access logs, and security metrics.

fhir_base_url.title: FHIR Server Base URL
fhir_base_url.description: Base URL for your FHIR R4 server endpoint

encryption_key.title: PHI Encryption Key
encryption_key.description: AES-256 encryption key for PHI data protection (HIPAA compliance)

audit_log_endpoint.title: Audit Log Endpoint
audit_log_endpoint.description: Endpoint for sending compliance audit logs

default_language.title: Default Language
default_language.description: Default language for clinical content (ar for Arabic, en for English)

clinical_specialties.title: Clinical Specialties
clinical_specialties.description: Comma-separated list of clinical specialties (Radiology, Laboratory, Cardiology, etc.)

max_audit_retention_days.title: Audit Log Retention (Days)
max_audit_retention_days.description: Number of days to retain audit logs for compliance
